summary.span: 提供一組標準的編輯相關命令。

span.span: Provides a standard set of editing related commands.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示編輯命令及相關聯的預設主要筆勢 (使用索引鍵的名稱，從和列舉型別)。The following table shows the editing commands and the associated default key gestures (with key names from the and enumerations). |編輯命令Editing command|預設按鍵動作Default key gesture| |---------------------|-------------------------| ||`Ctrl`+`E`| ||`Ctrl`+`J`| ||`Ctrl`+`L`| ||`Ctrl`+`R`| ||`Backspace`| ||沒有預設按鍵動作no default key gesture| ||`Ctrl`+`OemOpenBrackets`| ||`Ctrl`+`Shift`+`T`| ||`Delete`| ||`Ctrl`+`Delete`| ||`Ctrl`+`Backspace`| ||`Shift`+`Enter`| ||`Enter`| ||沒有預設按鍵動作no default key gesture| ||`Ctrl`+`OemCloseBrackets`| ||`Ctrl`+`T`| ||`Down`| ||`PageDown`| ||`Ctrl`+`Down`| ||`Left`| ||`Ctrl`+`Left`| ||`Right`| ||`Ctrl`+`Right`| ||`Ctrl`+`End`| ||`Ctrl`+`Home`| ||`End`| ||`Home`| ||`Up`| ||`PageUp`| ||`Ctrl`+`Up`| ||`Shift`+`Down`| ||`Shift`+`PageDown`| ||`Ctrl`+`Shift`+`Down`| ||`Shift`+`Left`| ||`Ctrl`+`Shift`+`Left`| ||`Shift`+`Right`| ||`Ctrl`+`Shift`+`Right`| ||`Ctrl`+`Shift`+`End`| ||`Ctrl`+`Shift`+`Home`| ||`Shift`+`End`| ||`Shift`+`Home`| ||`Shift`+`Up`| ||`Shift`+`PageUp`| ||`Ctrl`+`Shift`+`Up`| ||`Shift`+`Tab`| ||`Tab`| ||`Ctrl`+`B`| ||`Ctrl`+`Shift`+`L`| ||`Insert`| ||`Ctrl`+`I`| ||`Ctrl`+`Shift`+`N`| ||`Ctrl`+`OemPlus`| ||`Ctrl`+`Shift+OemPlus`| ||`Ctrl`+`U`| 插入號移動命令和選取項目展開命令共用一組通用的預設主要筆勢，一般的差異在於新增區別插入號移動命令中的選取範圍命令的索引鍵。Caret movement commands and selection expanding commands share a common set of default key gestures, the general difference being the addition of the key to differentiate selection commands from caret movement commands. 例如，命令有的預設按鍵動作，和對應命令有的預設按鍵動作 + 。For example, the command has a default key gesture of , and the corresponding command has a default key gesture of +. 所提供的命令定義的一般情況下，類別並不會讓使用命令參數 (`parameter`參數所預期方法)。In general, the command definitions provided by the class do not make use of command parameters (the `parameter` parameter expected by the method). 如需有關命令和命令的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information on commands and commanding, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何叫用支援的命令物件上的編輯命令。The following example demonstrates how to invoke an editing command on an object that supports the command. 此範例中，針對作為命令目標。For this example, a serves as the command target. 請注意，會實作介面 (繼承自)，而且它包含許多的編輯命令的原生支援。Note that implements the interface (inherited from ), and that it includes native support for many editing commands. 第一個引數方法是命令參數。The first argument for the method is a command parameter. 最編輯命令忽略的命令參數。這個參數應該是一般情況下，`null`編輯命令。Most editing commands ignore the command parameter; in general, this parameter should be `null` for editing commands. 第二個引數會指定將路由命令的物件。The second argument specifies the object to which the command will be routed. 這個物件必須實作介面，並應該包含指定的命令處理常式。This object must implement the interface, and should include a handler for the specified command. 一般而言，不會處理命令的物件上叫用時，已忽略命令。Generally, a command is ignored when invoked on an object that does not handle the command. [!code-csharp[RichTextBoxSnippets#_EditingCommands_Invoke](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RichTextBoxSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_editingcommands_invoke)] [!code-vb[RichTextBoxSnippets#_EditingCommands_Invoke](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RichTextBoxSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_editingcommands_invoke)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AlignCenter As RoutedUICommand
public: static property System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ AlignCenter { System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ get(); };

summary.span: 表示 命令，這個命令會要求目前的段落或選取的段落置中。

span.span: Represents the command, which requests that the current paragraph or a selection of paragraphs be centered.

value.span: 所要求的命令。

span.span: The requested command.

value.span: 此命令的預設按鍵動作是 + 。

span.span: The default key gesture for this command is +.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令會在運作層級。This command operates at the level. 部分選取的段落 （包括段落中有插入號的空選取範圍） 中的內容，叫用此命令時，才會將要求的效果套用到整個段落。If this command is invoked on a partial selection of content within a paragraph (including an empty selection where the caret is within a paragraph), the requested effect is applied to the entire paragraph. 如果此命令會叫用在橫跨多個段落的選取範圍上，選取範圍內每個段落的整個內容套用效果。If this command is invoked on a selection that spans multiple paragraphs, the effect is applied to the entire contents of each paragraph that participates in the selection. 下圖顯示置中的內容的範例。The following figure shows an example of centered content. ![螢幕擷取畫面： TextAlign 屬性值為 Center](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-center.png "螢幕擷取畫面： TextAlign 屬性值為 Center")![Screenshot: TextAlign property value of Center](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-center.png "Screenshot: TextAlign property value of Center") 此命令原生支援的。This command is natively supported by . ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AlignJustify As RoutedUICommand
public: static property System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ AlignJustify { System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ get(); };

summary.span: 表示 命令，這個命令會要求目前的段落或選取的段落對齊。

span.span: Represents the command, which requests that the current paragraph or a selection of paragraphs be justified.

value.span: 所要求的命令。

span.span: The requested command.

value.span: 此命令的預設按鍵動作是 + 。

span.span: The default key gesture for this command is +.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令會在運作層級。This command operates at the level. 部分選取的段落 （包括段落中有插入號的空選取範圍） 中的內容，叫用此命令時，才會將要求的效果套用到整個段落。If this command is invoked on a partial selection of content within a paragraph (including an empty selection where the caret is within a paragraph), the requested effect is applied to the entire paragraph. 如果此命令會在橫跨多個段落的選取範圍上叫用，效果會套用選取範圍中的所有段落。If this command is invoked on a selection that spans multiple paragraphs, the effect is applied to all the paragraphs in the selection. 當內容對齊時，內每一行的內容的水平間距會調整，使左右對齊的線的等於或接近相等的寬度。When content is justified, the horizontal spacing within each line of content is adjusted so that the justified lines are of equal or near-equal width. 內容通常是內容的側邊建立平滑的邊緣對齊。Content is typically justified to create smooth edges on the sides of the content. 通常很短於其餘部分，因為在段落中的最後一行會維持在對齊，直到此命令會叫用。Because it is often shorter than the rest, the last line in a paragraph may remain unjustified after this command is invoked. 下圖顯示對齊 （靠左對齊） 的內容。The following figure shows unjustified (left-aligned) content. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 內容尚未對齊](~/add/media/content-unjustified.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 內容尚未對齊")![Screenshot: Content is unjustified](~/add/media/content-unjustified.png "Screenshot: Content is unjustified") 下圖顯示相同的內容之後已右對齊。The following figure shows the same content after it has been justified. ![螢幕擷取畫面的內容對齊文字](~/add/media/content-justified.png "螢幕擷取畫面的內容對齊文字")![Screenshot of content justified text](~/add/media/content-justified.png "Screenshot of content justified text") 不一定會回應任何指定的物件; 在此命令的實際實作在許多情況下會回應至命令的實作會是應用程式寫入器的責任。There is not necessarily an actual implementation that responds to this command on any given object; in many cases the implementation that responds to a command is the responsibility of the application writer. 此命令原生支援的。This command is natively supported by . ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: 表示 命令，這個命令會要求在目前位置或目前選取範圍上輸入退格鍵。

value.span: 所要求的命令。

span.span: The requested command.

value.span: 這個命令的預設主要筆勢是 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當空的選取項目上叫用，則此命令會刪除之前插入號字元或段落分隔符號。When invoked on an empty selection, this command deletes the character or paragraph separator just before the caret. 當叫用非空白的選取項目，此命令會刪除選取項目。When invoked on a non-empty selection, this command deletes the selection. 此命令會保留已刪除的選取範圍，在叫用此命令之後立即插入相同的位置的內容中的任何格式。This command retains any formatting from the deleted selection for content immediately inserted at the same location after this command is invoked. 與相反命令，不會保留舊的格式設定。Contrast with the command, which does not retain previous formatting. 不一定會回應任何指定的物件; 在此命令的實際實作在許多情況下會回應至命令的實作會是應用程式寫入器的責任。There is not necessarily an actual implementation that responds to this command on any given object; in many cases the implementation that responds to a command is the responsibility of the application writer. 此命令原生支援的， ，和。This command is natively supported by , , and . ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令的行為取決於目前的選取範圍。The behavior for this command depends on the current selection. 如果選取項目為非空白，或如果是空的選取項目，而且目前的插入號位置的段落開頭，此命令相當於。If the selection is non-empty, or if the selection is empty and the current caret position is at the beginning of a paragraph, this command is equivalent to . 如果插入號位於資料表資料格 (由項目)，此命令會將插入號移至下一個資料格。If the caret is in a table cell (represented by the element), this command moves the caret to the next cell. 如果插入號是在資料表的最後一個資料格中，此命令會導致新的資料列附加至資料表中，插入號位於新的資料列的第一個資料格中。If the caret is in the last cell of a table, this command causes a new row to be appended to the table, with the caret positioned in the first cell of the new row. 否則，定位字元會插入目前的位置。Otherwise, a tab character is inserted in current position. 不一定會回應任何指定的物件; 在此命令的實際實作在許多情況下會回應至命令的實作會是應用程式寫入器的責任。There is not necessarily an actual implementation that responds to this command on any given object; in many cases the implementation that responds to a command is the responsibility of the application writer. 此命令原生支援的並(當屬性是`true`)。This command is natively supported by and (when the property is `true`). ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前的選取範圍是介於要，套用至目前的選取範圍。If the for the current selection is in the range from to , is applied to the current selection. 否則，套用。Otherwise, is applied. 如需比較的清單值，請參閱。For a comparative list of values, see . 當選取範圍是空的插入號是在 word 中時，選取項目已擴充成包括整個字。When the selection is empty and the caret is within a word, the selection is expanded to include the entire word. 不一定會回應任何指定的物件; 在此命令的實際實作在許多情況下會回應至命令的實作會是應用程式寫入器的責任。There is not necessarily an actual implementation that responds to this command on any given object; in many cases the implementation that responds to a command is the responsibility of the application writer. 此命令原生支援的。This command is natively supported by . ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令會在運作層級。This command operates at the level. 部分選取的段落 （包括段落中有插入號的空選取範圍） 中的內容，叫用此命令時，才會將要求的效果套用到整個段落。If this command is invoked on a partial selection of content within a paragraph (including an empty selection where the caret is within a paragraph), the requested effect is applied to the entire paragraph. 如果此命令會叫用在橫跨多個段落的選取範圍上，選取範圍內每個段落的整個內容套用效果。If this command is invoked on a selection that spans multiple paragraphs, the effect is applied to the entire contents of each paragraph that participates in the selection. 不一定會回應任何指定的物件; 在此命令的實際實作在許多情況下會回應至命令的實作會是應用程式寫入器的責任。There is not necessarily an actual implementation that responds to this command on any given object; in many cases the implementation that responds to a command is the responsibility of the application writer. 此命令原生支援的。This command is natively supported by . ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令會在運作層級。This command operates at the level. 部分選取的段落 （包括段落中有插入號的空選取範圍） 中的內容，叫用此命令時，才會將要求的效果套用到整個段落。If this command is invoked on a partial selection of content within a paragraph (including an empty selection where the caret is within a paragraph), the requested effect is applied to the entire paragraph. 如果此命令會叫用在橫跨多個段落的選取範圍上，選取範圍內每個段落的整個內容套用效果。If this command is invoked on a selection that spans multiple paragraphs, the effect is applied to the entire contents of each paragraph that participates in the selection. 不一定會回應任何指定的物件; 在此命令的實際實作在許多情況下會回應至命令的實作會是應用程式寫入器的責任。There is not necessarily an actual implementation that responds to this command on any given object; in many cases the implementation that responds to a command is the responsibility of the application writer. 此命令原生支援的。This command is natively supported by . ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```
